title: Breaching Midnight
description: Andy Versteckte has never been the type of girl to wake up screaming from a nightmare. She doesn't believe in ghosts, and she's even having a hard time believing in the vampires and lycnathropes that the government has recently given rights to. When her sister is taken from her by a creature from Andy's nightmares, she must not only face her demons, but become one herself.
author: F.L. Mahoney
